[bq="Princess♠Molestia"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/534c363d6368725d99810100#post_534c363d6368725d99810100
I have to agree there. Honestly. I want a story where werewolves and vampires have been known about since like Roman times and are normal citizens. And that it shows how their presence have effected society's growth,[/bq]
I'm actually working on something like this.

It was going to be a webcomic, but because I'm going back to school for video game design and programming I plan on combining all my story ideas into one for my portfolio in a thirty minute game(can't do longer cause realistically one person can only do so much and making a forty hour game with one person in a year and half is not realistic).
